author: kinman
msg: - Fixed 11485: recompilation of jsp files when TLD is modified.
- The generate servlet and tag handlers for the tag files now implements
JspSourceDependent, which is used to provide dependency info at runtime.
- Turned on include file dependency check.  Added tag files and TLD to
- Determined isTagFile property from TLD or implicit tag files.

author: luehe
msg: Simplified custom tag validation by replacing call to
getJspAttribute() with the constructor of Node.JspAttribute directly

author: bobh
msg: - similar to gump2.xml, but this uses the cvs HEAD to build jasper (for TC5)
